content: wolfberry knits motorcyclist s neckwarmer m aterials 4 5mm us 7 circular or double points a pprox 200m worsted weight or bulky wool soft as it will be up against the neck and jaw m easurements given in inches are approximate i nstructions c ast on 92 sts using long tail cast on place marker and join in the round being careful not to twist w ork in 2x2 rib for 16cm/6 1/2 change to st st knit every round placing marker after every 23 sts 3 times on first round k to end o f round marker next round ** kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb slip marker repeat from ** to end of round 8 sts increased n ext round k all sts repeat the last two rounds until st st section measures 7cm/2 3/4 w ork in 2x2 rib without increasing for 2cm/3/4 cast off loosely in rib weave in ends © bianca kingham wolfberry knits 2014
